TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_toda, title = toda, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/toda} }

S.FORM: alang toda ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Nin'ay go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 252 buwan, 795 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 773 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 22 hi nya. maki qu ngasal bziran ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na toda hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na toda hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na toda hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na toda hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na toda hya' ga ruku daya. tay mkyahu' na toda hya' ga bwarung. tay 'zil na toda hya' ga paran. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang toda ga niya mki sko Nanto Keng ato Nin'ay go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 252 bowan, 795 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 773 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 22 hi nya. maki qo ngasal bziran ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na toda hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na toda hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na toda hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na toda hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na toda hya' ga roko daya. tay mkyaho' na toda hya' ga bwarong. tay 'zil na toda hya' ga paran. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
